projects.title: Bank system
projects.description: A banking system for secure and easy account and transaction management.
projects.specification: A banking system designed to manage financial transactions, account operations, and user authentication. Features include automatic payments and advanced security to enhance reliability and user experience.

projects.title: Gym system
projects.description: A system for managing gym operations, including member registrations.
projects.specification: A comprehensive gym management system that handles member registrations, class scheduling, trainer assignments, and payment processing. Includes features for tracking member progress and attendance.

projects.title: Health Pal
projects.description: A health app that tracks activities, diet, sleep, and exercise.
projects.specification: An AI-powered health tracking application that provides personalized recommendations for diet, exercise, and sleep patterns. Includes integration with wearable devices and health monitoring systems.

projects.title: Study Mate
projects.description: An AI-powered study assistant for students.
projects.specification: An intelligent study assistant that helps students organize their study materials, create study schedules, and track their progress. Features include AI-powered content summarization and quiz generation.
